bio: In the name of my murdered parents, I wage eternal war on the criminals of Gotham City. I am vengeance. I am the night. I am Batman.
Faster than a speeding bullet, more powerful than a locomotiveâ€¦ The Man of Steel fights a never-ending battle for truth, justice, and the American way.
Beautiful as Aphrodite, wise as Athena, swifter than Hermes, and stronger than Hercules, Princess Diana of Themyscira fights for peace in Man's World.
